        Parameters:
        text$ - the text with which the added item should be filled

      • addItem

        public void addItem(BBjString text$,
BBjNumber f_checked,
BBjString img$)
        Uses the addItem function to add an item with the given text and the image from the link to the list
        Parameters:
        text$ - the text with which the added item should be filled
        f_checked - a number showing wether the box should be checked or not
        img$ - the link to the image file which should be added

      • addItem

        public void addItem(BBjString text$,
BBjNumber f_checked,
BBjImage img!)
        Adds an item with the given text and image to the list
        Parameters:
        text$ - the text with which the added item should be filled
        f_checked - a number showing wether the box should be checked or not
        img! - the image which is supposed to be added to the cell
